message: Let's split it fairly, 60-40. It's a good starting point.
You wanted 60-40, I'll meet you halfway at 70-30, but I'm not giving up too much ground.
You're still holding too much, I'll give you a better deal. 45-55, it's a fair compromise.
I'll take a small step towards your compromise, but I'm not giving up much more. You're still not getting the better deal you're looking for.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. 50-50, it's a fair split. Let's end this.
